bio: Arefin Shaon is a professional chef with over 10 years of experience in cooking delicious meals from various cuisines.

recipes.name: Spicy Chicken Curry
recipes.cookingMethod:
1. In a large skillet, cook chicken over medium heat until no longer pink. Remove from skillet and set aside. 
2. In the same skillet, cook onion and garlic until tender. Stir in tomatoes, tomato sauce, curry powder, cumin, and cayenne pepper. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes. 
3. Stir in yogurt and cooked chicken. Cook for an additional 5 minutes, or until heated through. Season with salt and pepper to taste. 
4. Serve over rice or with naan bread.

recipes.name: Tomato and Basil Bruschetta
recipes.cookingMethod:
1. Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). 
2. In a large bowl, mix together tomatoes, basil, garlic, balsamic vinegar, olive oil, salt, and pepper. 
3. Arrange baguette slices in a single layer on a baking sheet. Top each slice with the tomato mixture and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese. 
4. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until bread is lightly toasted and cheese is melted.
